LABEL: 0x3BA
STRING: It's morning...

LABEL: 0x3EF
STRING: I got ready and headed to school a bit depressed.

LABEL: 0x450
STRING: I arrived at the usual time and took a peek at the flower beds.

LABEL: 0x4A7
STRING: There's no way... you'll be here today, is there?

LABEL: 0x4F0
STRING: After everything that happened yesterday, of course not.

LABEL: 0x584
STRING: "No, no, please, I can manage on my own! Dad will be angry with me again if I have to go to the hospital!"

LABEL: 0x61D
STRING: I've been stuck on what Sycoe said to me.

LABEL: 0x674
STRING: "Dad will be angry with me again if I have to go to the hospital"

LABEL: 0x6CD
STRING: ...What the hell does that mean?

LABEL: 0x722
STRING: It's normal to have to go to a hospital after a serious injury like that. It's just common sense.

LABEL: 0x799
STRING: ...There's no helping it. I'll take over Sycoe's job for now.

LABEL: 0x7EE
STRING: It's not for Sycoe's sake. It's because it's not in my nature to leave things like this.

LABEL: 0x865
STRING: As I recall, all you have to do is fill up this watering can.

LABEL: 0x8CE
STRING: I mimic the actions she does every day.

LABEL: 0x929
STRING: When I sprinkled the water lightly over the flowers, a small rainbow was formed.

LABEL: 0x980
STRING: Today, there is no one to enjoy this time with me.

LABEL: 0x9D5
STRING: There's something... a little bit lonely about that.

LABEL: 0xA2C
STRING: I can't believe I'm feeling like this just because she's not at school...

LABEL: 0xB2C
STRING: Suddenly, I looked towards the school gate and saw a girl coming in late.

LABEL: 0xB93
STRING: She's wearing a cast on one leg and is walking slowly on crutches.

LABEL: 0xC02
STRING: ...It's Sycoe.

LABEL: 0xC3B
STRING: I was surprised and rushed over to her.

LABEL: 0xD2C
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xD3A
STRING: "...Whew. Metarou-kun, good morning. It's a beautiful day, isn't it? Ehehe..."

LIST.STRING: I'll help you to the classroom.

LABEL: 0xF1E
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0xF2C
STRING: "Yeah, I'm compeletely fine now."

LABEL: 0x10AB
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x10B9
STRING: "Ah... Sorry, thanks for the help."

LABEL: 0x1196
STRING: I took her bag and opened the school's front door for her.

LABEL: 0x1295
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x12A3
STRING: "Th-thanks, Metarou-kun."

LABEL: 0x1420
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x142E
STRING: "Eheh... I'm sorry for making you worry, but I managed to get permission to come to school."

LABEL: 0x15D9
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x15E7
STRING: "But I'm not supposed to carry anything heavy, so it's kind of inconvenient."

LABEL: 0x16EB
STRING: She smiles pathetically, as if she doesn't care about what happened yesterday.

LABEL: 0x1764
STRING: Seriously... what kind of mental fortitude does this girl have?

LABEL: 0x17C1
STRING: She was scared that her father would be angry with her, but what happened in the end?

LABEL: 0x1834
STRING: What kind of parents would make a fuss about medical bills when their daughter is seriously injured?

LABEL: 0x189D
STRING: Parents should value their children's lives more than money... I thought that should have been obvious, but I guess not.

LABEL: 0x1924
STRING: I was curious, but I couldn't bring it up because it felt like a delicate topic...

LABEL: 0x1C0A
STRING: ─Around noon.

LABEL: 0x1C4D
STRING: Students are heading to their favourite places to spread out the contents of their lunch boxes.

LABEL: 0x1CB0
STRING: In the midst of all this, a dark-haired, slant-eyed girl was boredly fiddling with her phone in the space behind the gym.

LABEL: 0x1D3B
STRING: A petite girl with short hair comes running up to her.

LABEL: 0x1DA0
STRING: It seemed that the two girls arranged to meet here.

LABEL: 0x1F2D
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1F3B
STRING: "...You're late. How long do you want me to wait?"

LABEL: 0x20C1
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x20CF
STRING: "I'm sorry I'm late... I-I'm on day duty today."

LABEL: 0x226C
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x227A
STRING: "I don't know anything about that, so stop making excuses."

LABEL: 0x2406
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x2414
STRING: "Oh... um... I'm really, really sorry..."

LABEL: 0x2599
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x25A7
STRING: "Well... Nana-san, you are... ...Metarou-kun's... childhood friend. ...Aren't you?"

LABEL: 0x2748
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x2756
STRING: "That's right, I'm Metarou's childhood friend."

LABEL: 0x28DA
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x28E8
STRING: "M-my name is Sycoe. ...I've always been indebted to Metarou-kun. ...Uh..."

LABEL: 0x2A9B
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x2AA9
STRING: "I know. You can cut the introduction."

LABEL: 0x2C27
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x2C35
STRING: "A, ah... yes."

LABEL: 0x2DA6
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x2DB4
STRING: "Do you have any idea why I called you here...? You have no idea, I guess."

LABEL: 0x2F5E
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x2F6C
STRING: "S-sorry... I don't know. Sorry..."

LABEL: 0x30FD
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x310B
STRING: "Well, I'll make it quick then."

LABEL: 0x3291
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3400
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x340E
STRING: "Stay away from Metarou."

LABEL: 0x358E
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3701
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x370F
STRING: "I'm really sorry... I don't want to say this either, but..."

LABEL: 0x38AE
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x38BC
STRING: "If it continues like this, misfortune will get to Metarou. ...You know what I mean, don't you?"

LABEL: 0x3A70
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3A7E
STRING: "Yeah... uh.... er, that's... it's..."

LABEL: 0x3C07
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3C15
STRING: "Everyone who hangs around you becomes struck with misfortune. Isn't that right? It's a rumour going around school."

LABEL: 0x3DC7
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x3F3A
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3F48
STRING: "Or do you have a hand in it? Directly."

LABEL: 0x40D2
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x40E0
STRING: "...No, that's wrong...!"

LABEL: 0x4253
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4261
STRING: "I see, well I hope so."

LABEL: 0x43D8
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x43E6
STRING: "I care about Metarou... because he's my childhood friend. I'd be sad if he died because of you."

LABEL: 0x45A4
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x45B2
STRING: "...Yeah."

LABEL: 0x4719
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4727
STRING: "If you were in my shoes, you'd understand how I feel, right?"

LABEL: 0x48C3
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x48D1
STRING: "...I understand. Nana-san, for making you come out and say this... I'm sorry."

LABEL: 0x4A6E
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x4A7C
STRING: "I don't want to see Metarou-kun suffer because of me either."

LABEL: 0x4C19
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x4C27
STRING: "So I won't go near Metarou-kun again. I promise."

LABEL: 0x4DC8
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4DD6
STRING: "Thanks."

LABEL: 0x4F44
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x4F52
STRING: "So, I hope..."

LABEL: 0x50C1
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x50CF
STRING: "I hope you two will be happy together."

LABEL: 0x540D
STRING: ──After school, when the sky glows orange at dusk.

LABEL: 0x5462
STRING: Where did she go? I haven't seen Sycoe since this morning.

LABEL: 0x54CD
STRING: It's not like we promised to meet each other, but I was kind of worried and looked anywhere I could think of.

LABEL: 0x5550
STRING: I'm usually a bit slow on the uptake, so I should at least try to help out at times like this.

LABEL: 0x55D3
STRING: The classroom, the courtyard, the flowerbeds... Ah, she's here!

LABEL: 0x5622
STRING: I walked over to Sycoe as naturally as I could.

LABEL: 0x572E
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x573C
STRING: "M-Me...tarou...kun."

LABEL: 0x5811
STRING: I found her looking sad, like she's about to start crying.

LABEL: 0x5867
STRING: ...What now. What kind of misfortune happened this time?

LABEL: 0x5908
STRING: I started having some second thoughts about getting involved.

LABEL: 0x5961
STRING: I'm probably not as good a person as I pretend to be. I'm just a kid with parents who support me and take care of me.

LABEL: 0x59F2
STRING: It's too soon for me to save anyone.

LABEL: 0x5A3E
STRING: When I'm older, when I can protect someone... then I'll be able to.

LABEL: 0x5C96
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x5CA4
STRING: "Nooooooooooooooooooooo!!!!!"

LABEL: 0x5D0D
STRING: I was crushed under a steel girder that fell from the roof of the school building...

LABEL: Custom3
STRING: BAD END「Absurdity」

LABEL: 0x5FA5
STRING: Good grief, I thought, reaching out to pat her head...

LABEL: 0x60AA
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x6224
STRING: Suddenly, Sycoe pushed me, and I fell to the ground on my butt.

LABEL: 0x628D
STRING: And then right afterwards, there was the sound of something clanging.

LABEL: 0x62F2
STRING: Ow, ouch... Sheesh, what did you do that for?

LABEL: 0x63B1
STRING: When I opened my eyes, I found myself face to face with Sycoe, who had fallen on top of me.

LABEL: 0x6432
STRING: Heavy... But this might be the first time I've seen her this close.

LABEL: 0x64E4
STRING: You're always such a scatterbrain, but it's times like this that you don't say anything.

LABEL: 0x6557
STRING: When I looked in the direction of the sound, I saw broken pieces of flowerpots scattered about.

LABEL: 0x65CA
STRING: You're not telling me this would have fallen on my head just now? Oi oi, are you kidding...?

LABEL: 0x663B
STRING: What would have happened to me if this thing had hit my head? I don't want to think about it.

LABEL: 0x671E
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x672C
STRING: "Fweeh... Hic..."

LABEL: 0x6783
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x6791
STRING: "Sniff... I... I... can't... anymore."

LABEL: 0x67F2
STRING: She covered her face with her hands, speaking in a voice that sounds like she's about to cry.

LABEL: 0x6856
STRING: I put my hand on her trembling back and gave her a gentle pat.

LIST.STRING: Don't worry, you'll be okay for sure.

LABEL: 0x6967
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x6975
STRING: "...No matter what I do, it's useless!"

LABEL: 0x69D6
STRING: As she said this, she had tears in her eyes.

LABEL: 0x6A3D
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x6A4B
STRING: "What do you know, Metarou-kun?! You don't even know anything, right?!"

LABEL: 0x6ACE
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x6ADC
STRING: "Nothing can be done about it anymore... Sycoe's... Sycoe's cursed!"

LABEL: 0x6B86
STRING: I'm sure she's been trying her hardest for a long, long time before she met me...

LABEL: 0x6BF3
STRING: With resignation, despair, and disappointment... Sycoe had been suffering her whole life.

LABEL: 0x6CC4
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x6CD2
STRING: "Metarou-kun... I want you to stay away from me."

LABEL: 0x6D39
STRING: A single sentence pierced my heart.

LABEL: 0x6DA2
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x6DB0
STRING: "If you don't... you might die next time, Metarou-kun."

LABEL: 0x6E21
STRING: Like shards of glass, those sharp words pierced my heart.

LABEL: 0x6EA6
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x6F37
STRING: After saying that, she ran away from me.

LABEL: 0x6F9A
STRING: ...Why did it end up like this?

LABEL: 0x6FD7
STRING: What did I do... that in the end I would become so frustrated?

LABEL: 0x704C
STRING: I just wanted to rescue her... to save her, that's all.

LABEL: 0x70B7
STRING: Even just that, will the world not even allow that to happen...?

LABEL: 0x711E
STRING: The bitter look she gave me at the end is still burned into my eyes.

LABEL: 0x7189
STRING: Will I not be able to save her?

LABEL: 0x71E2
STRING: My own strength... is not that much less than the strength of her misfortune, is it?

LABEL: 0x7255
STRING: ...Is it hubris to think that I'm going to "save" her?

LABEL: 0x72CC
STRING: ...That's not true.

LABEL: 0x730F
STRING: Even if I'm like this, I might be able to save someone, you know?

LABEL: 0x7370
STRING: You never know until you try!

LABEL: 0x73C3
STRING: You don't know the outcome until you try it.

LABEL: 0x741A
STRING: Life is fleeting, and there's no time to dwell on it...

LABEL: 0x7485
STRING: So I'm going to Talk with Sycoe again tomorrow.

LABEL: 0x7740
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x774E
STRING: "Good morning, Mom."

LABEL: 0x7795
STRING: I greeted my mother, who was in the living room preparing breakfast.

LABEL: 0x7804
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0x7816
STRING: "Sycoe, your father's lost his job."

LABEL: 0x7876
STRING: My greetings are ignored, and I'm informed about Dad's restructuring.

LABEL: 0x78EF
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x78FD
STRING: "...You were upset yesterday. What should Sycoe do?

LABEL: 0x797A
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0x798C
STRING: "There's nothing you can do about it."

LABEL: 0x79EE
STRING: The questions I asked her were quickly dismissed.

LABEL: 0x7A65
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0x7A77
STRING: "Things are so bad, I'm going to have to start working more... No, even my salary can't cover it..."

LABEL: 0x7B11
STRING: Muttering darkly, my mother held her head in despair.

LABEL: 0x7B84
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x7B92
STRING: "M-Mo... Mom..."

LABEL: 0x7BEF
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x7BFD
STRING: "What if I quit school? Then you won't have to pay for it, right?"

LABEL: 0x7C6A
STRING: When I made such a suggestion, my mother glared at me.

LABEL: 0x7CE3
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0x7CF5
STRING: "What are you talking about? You think that will be allowed? Go to school."

LABEL: 0x7D83
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x7D91
STRING: "Eh...? W-why? I'm fine with not going if it helps Mom and Dad..."

LABEL: 0x7E1C
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0x7E2E
STRING: "If you stopped going to school, how do you think society will look at us?"

LABEL: 0x7EC2
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x7ED0
STRING: "Ah... yeah..."

LABEL: 0x7F0F
STRING: And since then...

LABEL: 0x7F50
STRING: Dad started going to pachinko parlors and spending money as if he had given up on life.

LABEL: 0x7FDB
STRING: Dad

LABEL: 0x7FED
STRING: "I just need to win once, you know?! It'll be alright, I'll definitely earn it all back!!"

LABEL: 0x8069
STRING: Mom has been poking her face into some strange establishments.

LABEL: 0x80C0
STRING: She brought home expensive-looking vases and statues that look like a mix of animals and humans.

LABEL: 0x8141
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0x8153
STRING: "Look, Sycoe. This is a vase that can help you earn money just by placing it in your house!"

LABEL: 0x81D0
STRING: Mom

LABEL: 0x81E2
STRING: "This statue is the guardian god of some country in the south. If you leave it in your room, it will bring you happiness!"

LABEL: 0x8256
STRING: Even though I had a bad feeling about it, I couldn't stop the two of them from going crazy.

LABEL: 0x82CD
STRING: I... can't do anything, I'm no use at all.

LABEL: 0x8318
STRING: After a while, people who looked like yakuza began to frequently stop by my house.

LABEL: 0x8387
STRING: They slammed our front door roughly and yelled at us.

LABEL: 0x83EC
STRING: My father had gone to a pachinko parlor and my mother went to a strange establishment.

LABEL: 0x8447
STRING: So it's just me in the house right now...

LABEL: 0x84A6
STRING: Man

LABEL: 0x84B2
STRING: "I know you're in there!!"

LABEL: 0x8508
STRING: The voices grew louder and louder, and I ran into the closet.

LABEL: 0x856F
STRING: I covered my mouth with my shaking hands and quieted my breathing.

LABEL: 0x85C0
STRING: Boom boom, bang bang bang.

LABEL: 0x8605
STRING: Bang, Bang, Bang...

LABEL: 0x864C
STRING: The sounds don't stop, and before I knew it, I found myself in tears.

LABEL: 0x86F8
STRING: ...How long?

LABEL: 0x8733
STRING: How long I will I have to live in fear like this?

LABEL: 0x88A9
STRING: That night, there was a fire in the town.

LABEL: 0x890A
STRING: A girl stands blankly in front of her apartment, which is burning furiously.

LABEL: 0x899C
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x89F7
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x8A46
STRING: The apartment is surrounded by onlookers and many screams can be heard.

LABEL: 0x8AB1
STRING: Firefighters are working to put out the fire, but it doesn't appear to be under control.

LABEL: 0x8B1C
STRING: The girl, who had been standing there looking at the tragic scene, eventually falls on her knees.

LABEL: 0x8BAD
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x8BBB
STRING: "My... It's my fault... What should I do, what should I do...?"

LABEL: 0x8C1E
STRING: She lived in a room on the first floor of that apartment.

LABEL: 0x8C81
STRING: It seems that this was the very place where the fire started.

LABEL: 0x8CD8
STRING: Tears overflowed and formed drops running down from her clear eyes.

LABEL: 0x8D49
STRING: Sycoe

LABEL: 0x8D57
STRING: "...Mom, Dad... don't leave me..."

LABEL: 0x8DC2
STRING: Is it despair in her eyes, or the remembrance of her deceased parents?

LABEL: 0x8E33
STRING: Or...
